From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

Ice transformed fully to owl mode shrinking to about a third her former size
causeing the net to pass over her and land harmlessly on the ground. Her
beak glowed and fired another ball of energy depletion at Surgital.
"Combined strength and intelligence you say?" She couldn't repress letting
out a chuckle as she responded, "unfortunately five times your intelligence
still ends up as a big fat ZERO." The mutant was afraid for her life but
deep down inside she knew that if she was going to command she couldn't let
her feelings show.

Alpa Dolphy was grabbed by the monstrosity before them, now what was the
newly self appointed leader of the Maximals to do? While scanning the
situation her train of thought was once again inturupted by the sight of two
missles comeing in her direction.  The mutant owl put up a telekinetic
shield to deflect the missles. It didn't work the way she intended as the
missles struck her shield and exploded and Ice careened into the Earth
below. Though the missles did little phisical damage she couldn't keep her
shield up when she hit the ground. White feathers floated through the air in
the path Ice had taken downward. Again she forced herself to her feat
transforming this time to her Polar bear mode.

Furious by now about the lack of concern the Bodicons had for life the angry
polar bear used her right front paw and slapped away a sawblade that was
aimed to decapitate her. The sawblade spun into the ground near Ice leaving
a large gash through both her paw and the ground where it had landed. Her
pain was obvious to those around as she pushed herself forward determined to
stop the carnage around her even at the cost of her own spark.

The corageous female stared up toward the giant snarling as she made eye
contact. "Operate as one?" she thought to herself, "That is thier weekness."
Not even the five shots from Perceptor could push her from her three
remaining good paws as her determination grew.

Glareing toward the Gestault like a mother protecting her cubs the polar
bear concentrated her thoughts and mentally directed them into the thought
processors of Surgital. Seperated she'd only be able to hit one at a time,
combined she could hit all five at once. Though she could detect the serated
thoughts of the five bodicons she could still sense that what one fealt
they'd all feel. Concentrating as if her own life depended on it she
broadcast one thought, "PAIN."

Subject: Re: Mutant vs Decepticons.
